description: Returns the credentials to access the external Dataview from an S3 location. To call this API:

parameters.name: dataViewId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Dataview that you want to access.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Dataset.

nested_items.name: credentials
nested_items.description: The credentials required to access the external Dataview from the S3 location.

nested_items.name: accessKeyId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the security credentials.

nested_items.name: secretAccessKey
nested_items.description: The secret access key that can be used to sign requests.

nested_items.name: sessionToken
nested_items.description: The token that users must pass to use the credentials.

nested_items.name: expiration
nested_items.description: The Epoch time when the current credentials expire.

nested_items.name: s3Location
nested_items.description: The location where the external Dataview is stored.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The path of the folder, within the S3 bucket that contains the Dataset.
